analysis.description:
Lescovex.transfer (/unique_chucks/26/0xcf321c5e50ea2222843fa4f0124cc2d1e0110aea.sol#86-101) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > blockEndICO || msg.sender == owner) (/unique_chucks/26/0xcf321c5e50ea2222843fa4f0124cc2d1e0110aea.sol#89-90)

Lescovex.buy (/unique_chucks/26/0xcf321c5e50ea2222843fa4f0124cc2d1e0110aea.sol#291-301) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < blockEndICO) (/unique_chucks/26/0xcf321c5e50ea2222843fa4f0124cc2d1e0110aea.sol#296-297)

Lescovex.LescovexAddr should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0xcf321c5e50ea2222843fa4f0124cc2d1e0110aea.sol#187-188)
Lescovex.tokenUnit should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0xcf321c5e50ea2222843fa4f0124cc2d1e0110aea.sol#181-182)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0xcf321c5e50ea2222843fa4f0124cc2d1e0110aea.sol:
